moves.1. d4: Torre vs Lasker 1925 Moscow Is a windmill worth a queen sac?
moves.1... Nf6 2. Nf3 e6 3. Bg5 c5 4. e3 cxd4: Torre goes for the sawmill at the cost of a queen.
moves.27... Kg8 28. Rg7+: White says thanks  may I have another?
moves.30... Kh8 31. Rg5+: White gets the queen back with interest.
Lasker resigned. Lasker was world champ for over 25 years. But you can't win them all.

opening: Queen's pawn (A46), Torre attack, Wagner gambit
